name: Mitigation Playbook for Command Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker exploited a vulnerable web application to execute commands via the server's command interpreter.

parallel--b167b3d6-ecf2-4269-a9e7-3f2e31.name: Initiate Mitigation Actions
parallel--b167b3d6-ecf2-4269-a9e7-3f2e31.description: Simultaneous execution of multiple mitigation actions.

action--f2ca52a1-0ff2-4f8d-88e2-22e8e6bf.name: Kill malicious process
action--f2ca52a1-0ff2-4f8d-88e2-22e8e6bf.description: Terminate any running malicious processes detected on the host.

action--b44b5b68-dbc4-45ee-86a9-264e5a88.name: Isolate affected host from network
action--b44b5b68-dbc4-45ee-86a9-264e5a88.description: Block network access to the compromised host to prevent further exploitation.

action--c6e89e8e-d5e2-4827-9a77-e6c3d53d.name: Change all passwords for affected accounts
action--c6e89e8e-d5e2-4827-9a77-e6c3d53d.description: Lock user accounts suspected to be compromised.

action--d1ae9b43-dae8-4bae-bccd-3a2a8c20.name: Perform a full system scan
action--d1ae9b43-dae8-4bae-bccd-3a2a8c20.description: Scan the entire system for malicious files or processes.

action--c90169e6-8651-401d-9c5e-2216f74d.name: Review web server logs
action--c90169e6-8651-401d-9c5e-2216f74d.description: Check the latest access logs for any suspicious activity.
